parameter.value: Welcome |PLAYERNAME|! Can I help you? Say {help}. I also sell some items and blessings, say {trade} or {bless}. If you want to live here and also say {set my town}.
The map has 11 cities. Dorion, Yalahar, Alfon, Venonh, Anknor, Smallville, Infernium, Flam, Saari and Mirand Theraan. Can be accessed through the boat with a captains or in the magic carpets.
There are over 15.000 monsters around the map.
To buy premium say {trade} and buy a premium scroll.
Addons can be earned in quests or talking to NPCs, just say {addon}.
The mounts can be achieved with the Julie and with monsters that can be found across the map.
Comedinha sell bless for a good value. I sell them all by 50.000, say {buy all}. Or if you want, I sell {twist of fate}.
